column2: ITP009-9 - Installation of New Secondary Cable
column8: ITP009-9 - Installation of New Secondary Cable

column2: 1.0 Installation of New Secondary Cable in Existing Shallow Base Canister
Acceptance Criteria: Slots marked out and cut from to light base.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 009
Acceptance Criteria: Cables ran and connected from existing base via joints/slots/conduits to SIT pit.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 009
Acceptance Criteria: Once cables installed, backing rod placed and expansion joints sealed with approved product.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 009
Acceptance Criteria: Gasket positioned on light top, light plugged and positioned to current orientation. Light tested and area cleaned before demobilisation.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed / Avionics Checklist 0089
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
